short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make YouTube player sticky and read comments while watching videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhnance the YouTube and allows you to read comments while watching a video by making the player stick to the top of the browser screen.

It works in both light and dark modes. It supports normal and theater mode.
